ygData.subject: Material Elf (Parody of Madonna's Material Girl)
ygData.msgSnippet: On a board I frequent is a certain girl who is always posting about the loot she wants. It inspired me to write this song. - Reed Stormwind (E ci) A Material
ygData.messageBody:
On a board I frequent is a certain girl who is always posting about
the loot she wants. It inspired me to write this song.

- Reed Stormwind (E'ci)

A Material Elf
(Sung to Madonna's "Material Girl")

Some groups want me, some groups beg me
I think they're O.K.
If they don't put me on their loot list
I just walk away.

They can beg and they can plead
But they're just there to fight, that's right
`Cause the groups with the cold hard loot
Always turns out right, `cause we are

Chorus:
Living in a Verant made world
And I am a material elf
You know that we are living in a Verant made world
And I am a material elf.

Some groups do raids, some groups get paid
That's all right with me
If they can't give me proper treasure
Have to let them be

Some groups try and some groups die
They don't see the light
Only groups who give me rare drops
Make me squeal in delight, `cause they are

(chorus)

Living in a Verant made world [Verant made]
Living in a Verant made world
(repeat)

Groups may come and groups may go
And that's all right with me.
Equipment is what it's all about:
Survivability, `cause everybody's

(chorus)
